name: Hazel's Hexenhaus
description:
Introduction

This game was created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Fly on your broom, turn into a cat and make some crafts! This game is meant to be relaxing and lighthearted.

Hazel's had a hard day, now she's missing a few ingredients to conjure up something to eat. Explore her world and help friends along the way.  Play 3 relaxing arcade minigames, and you might just find what you need.

Game Controls:

A+D to move Left and Right
Space to interact
